problem_names:
lemma weakenTransitionCases[consumes 1, case_names cBase cStep]:
  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and "Prop (\<tau>) P"
  and "\<And>P''' P''. \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'''; \<Psi> \<rhd> P''' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''; \<Psi> \<rhd> P'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> Prop \<alpha> P'"

  shows "Prop \<alpha> P'"

lemma statImpTauChainDerivative:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P    :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   P'   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'"

  shows "insertAssertion (extractFrame P) \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame P') \<Psi>"

lemma weakenTauChain:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   P  :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   P' :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   \<Psi>' :: 'b

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'"
  shows "\<Psi> \<otimes> \<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'"
translations:
lemma weakenTransitionCases[consumes 1, case_names cBase cStep]:
  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and "Prop (\<tau>) P"
  and "\<And>P''' P''. \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'''; \<Psi> \<rhd> P''' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''; \<Psi> \<rhd> P'' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> Prop \<alpha> P'"

  shows "Prop \<alpha> P'"

lemma statImpTauChainDerivative:
  fixes \<Psi>   :: 'b
  and   P    :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   P'   :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'"

  shows "insertAssertion (extractFrame P) \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame P') \<Psi>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
     \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame P')
 \<Psi>

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. insertAssertion (extractFrame P)
     \<Psi> \<hookrightarrow>\<^sub>F insertAssertion (extractFrame P')
 \<Psi>
by(induct rule: tauChainInduct) (auto intro: statImpTauDerivative dest: FrameStatImpTrans)

lemma weakenTauChain:
  fixes \<Psi>  :: 'b
  and   P  :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   P' :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi"
  and   \<Psi>' :: 'b

  assumes "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'"
  shows "\<Psi> \<otimes> \<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<otimes>
    \<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a.
       \<Psi> \<otimes>
       \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> a
 2. \<And>a b c.
       \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<otimes>
        \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<rhd> b \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> c\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<otimes>
                         \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> c

proof (state)
this:

 2. \<And>a b c.
       \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<otimes>
        \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<rhd> b \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> c\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<otimes>
                         \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> c

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<otimes> \<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P

       \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<otimes>
        \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<rhd> b \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> c\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<otimes>
                         \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> c

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b c.
       \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<otimes>
        \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<rhd> b \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> c\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<otimes>
                         \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> c

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'
  \<Psi> \<otimes>
  \<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P' \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> P''

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b c.
       \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<otimes>
        \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<rhd> b \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> c\<rbrakk>

proof (state)
this:

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b c.
       \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<otimes>
        \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<rhd> b \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> c\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<otimes>
                         \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> c

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<otimes>
  \<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b c.
       \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<otimes>
        \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<rhd> b \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> c\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<otimes>
                         \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> c

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<rhd> P' \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> P''

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Psi> \<otimes> \<Psi>' \<rhd> P' \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> P''

proof (state)
this:
  \<Psi> \<otimes> \<Psi>' \<rhd> P' \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> P''

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b c.
       \<lbrakk>\<Psi> \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;
        \<Psi> \<otimes>
        \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> b;

       \<Longrightarrow> \<Psi> \<otimes>
                         \<Psi>' \<rhd> a \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> c

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<Psi> \<otimes>
  \<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'
  \<Psi> \<otimes> \<Psi>' \<rhd> P' \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> P''

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Psi> \<otimes>
  \<Psi>' \<rhd> P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<^sub>\<tau> P'
  \<Psi> \<otimes> \<Psi>' \<rhd> P' \<longmapsto> \<tau> \<prec> P''

goal (1 subgoal):
